item.title: Trump administration ends lease for three golf courses in the District
item.description: The Trump administration has ended the lease agreement with the National Links Trust for three golf courses in the District.

item.title: 'Nothing really happens': Lawmakers frustrated about inaction on kids' online safety bills
item.description: Lawmakers are tired of teaming up on bipartisan bills to protect kids online, only to have the broadly supported measures languish.

item.title: A year after DOGE, the cuts keep coming
item.description: The Department of Government Efficiency hasn't come close to achieving the $1 trillion in cuts pledged at its launch last January but it has rooted ou...

item.title: Trump attracts America's billionaires to bankroll policies and projects
item.description: President Trump loves billionaires, and they seemingly love him, too. America's wealthiest have all but lined up to fund the president's pet projects ...

item.title: Meta's new AI privacy policy allows targeted ads, possibly political ads, based on chats with bots
item.description: Some Instagram users may start seeing that political advertisements mirror what they say and search on the social media platform.
